family_members.name: Juan Pablo Rivillas Ospina
family_members.bio: Loves to travel with his family, learn about new technologies and write in his blog. He's originally from Colombia but moved to Brazil in 2013. After that, has has lived in the United States for a year and today he spends most of the time with his family in their beach house in Sao Miguel dos Milagres. Coffee lover, tail teller and a very empathetic person. His family is his everything.

family_members.name: Alessandra Magalhaes de Souza Lima
family_members.bio: Passionate mother. Loves to spend time with her family, traveling and discovering new places in the nature. She's a natural dreamer. What she visions, she makes happen. Dedicated mother and wife. A woman that conquers anybody's heart with her smile, kindness and contagious laugh.

family_members.name: Joao Rivillas de Magalhaes
family_members.bio: A very curious child. Loves to ride his bike with his brother David, go to the beach to grab crabs and travel with his family. The world is his home.

family_members.name: David Rivillas de Magalhaes
family_members.bio: Funniest child. Loves to ride his bike with his brother Joao, go to the beach to grab crabs. He loves animals and loves any adventure with his brother. He's very smart and loves to explore the nature, ask questions and look at the sky.

family_members.name: Rosalba del Consuelo Ospina Montoya
family_members.bio: Dedicated mother and daughter. Strong woman who raised three boys on her own for many years. Loves a crossword puzzle, reading the three musketeers and enjoying a cup of coffee in the morning.

family_members.name: Tulio Mario Rivillas Zapata
family_members.bio: Thing of a tough, hardworking person. Dedicated his life to his family. Moved to the US many years ago to provide for his family. Endured the hardest challenges in life, fell countless times, and never gave up. Today he lives in the US with his wife and daughter.

family_members.name: Izabela Magalhaes de Souza Lima
family_members.bio: A very special person. She loves painting, reading, and spending time near her family. The most empathetic person in the family. She unites everyone with her smile and her kindness. Spends her day chasing her nephews, Joao and David, as well as enduring his brother in law Juan Pablo.

family_members.name: Evaldo de Souza Lima
family_members.bio: Hardworking father and husband. Dedicated his life to providing for his family. Known for his wisdom and quiet strength. Enjoys spending time with his grandchildren and sharing stories of his youth.

family_members.name: Cleolice Magalhaes de Souza Lima
family_members.bio: The biggest hearh in the family. She loves sitting on the kitchen's table and talk with whomever is there. Give her a cup of coffee and a slice of cheese and you'll have the best friend you ever need. Loves fishing and traveling with her family. Spends her day chasing her grandchildren, Joao and David.
